Experience and control your Apple Home in a whole new way with Controller for HomeKit. Our app combines all the familiar HomeKit features with numerous additional enhancements, offering you a user-friendly interface, unparalleled control, and flexibility.

* FLOOR PLAN: Create a detailed floor plan of your home using the LiDAR sensor on your iPhone or iPad and control your HomeKit accessories directly through the floor plan.
* COMPLEX AUTOMATIONS: Utilize advanced triggers and conditions for custom automations that are perfectly tailored to your needs.
* NOTIFICATIONS: Create custom notifications to stay informed about important events in your home.
* BACKUPS: Secure your setup and restore it easily when needed.
* SMART FOLDERS: Organize your devices and automations effortlessly with smart folders and custom filters.
* WORKFLOWS: Optimize your daily routines with workflows that go beyond the capabilities of Apple Home.
* SETUP CODES: Securely store your HomeKit and Matter codes in the app, so they are always at hand and never lost.
* MAINTENANCE: Keep track of your setup, quickly identifying which batteries need to be replaced, which devices are unreachable, or which automations are broken.
* LOGS: Monitor all activities and changes in your smart home.
* WIDGETS: Control your devices faster and easier with convenient widgets or quickly jump into your floor plan.

Unlock the full potential of your smart home with Controller for HomeKit. Download the app now and experience how simple and intuitive home automation can be.

For more information, visit our website: https://www.controllerforhomekit.com

hk.description:
Dawncaster: Epic Deck-Building Adventure

Dive into a world of strategy and magic in Dawncaster, the ultimate deck-building experience with over 900 stunning hand-illustrated cards. Will you become a shadow-dancing rogue, an indomitable warrior, a mysterious Seeker, or forge your own path? Unravel the dark secrets of Aethos in this tactical masterpiece that revolutionizes mobile card gaming.

Redefining Card Games

- Experience groundbreaking mechanics that seasoned players will love
- Blend unique class abilities with powerful weapons and enchantments
- Master an innovative energy system, freeing you from traditional deckbuilder constraints

A World Shrouded in Mystery

- Embark on a quest to find the legendary 'Dawnbringer' lost in the corrupted realm of Umbris
- Immerse yourself in a richly illustrated world with compelling dialogue and meaningful choices
- Shape the fate of a desperate world through your actions

Complete Gaming Experience

- Unlock all cards and classes with your purchase - no microtransactions!
- Open up new exciting area's with optional expansion packs for even more content
- Enjoy a premium game free from ads, timers, or pay-to-win mechanics

Endless Replayability

- Every run is unique with randomized encounters and battles
- Unlock new starting cards, portraits, and challenges
- Test your skills with increasing difficulty levels

Join the Dawncaster Community

- Connect with fellow players and developers on the Discord server
- Share strategies, get the latest updates, and influence the game's future
- Be part of a passionate community that's shaping the future of Dawncaster

Ready to answer the call? Download Dawncaster now and begin your legendary journey!

Discord: https://discord.gg/pfeMG9c
Website: https://dawncaster.wanderlost.games

hk.description:
●遊戲概述：
遊戲方法很簡單，通過讓相同的水果組合，不斷進化，最終進化成為西瓜；
在努力獲得更高分數的同時注意不要讓水果從箱子中溢出。相同的水果組合會「進化」，如果是西瓜組合會發生什麼呢？
每日排名都在更新，讓我們一起努力成為排名第一吧！

●遊戲方法：
1. 相同種類的水果組合後，會「進化」成更大的水果並得分；
2. 通過手指左右移動「Poppy」，手指離開螢幕水果就會掉落。也可以直接點擊箱子裡的位置，使水果往點擊的方向掉落；
3. 箱子裡的水果溢出就會遊戲結束。

●公告：
更多關於西瓜遊戲的官方信息。
請參考以下連結：西瓜遊戲官方網站： https://suikagame.jp/

hk.description:
MOTORSPORT MANAGER 4: MASTER RACE STRATEGY

BUILD YOUR RACING DYNASTY
Immerse yourself in the captivating journey of constructing your motorsport empire from the ground up, where every choice holds the key to your success.

ASSEMBLE YOUR DREAM TEAM
Hand-pick exceptional drivers and engineer a world-class racing powerhouse. Collaborate closely with drivers to secure pole positions and craft pitstop strategies that lead to race domination.

REAL-TIME STRATEGY UNFOLDS
Experience the adrenaline-pumping action of races in real-time or navigate through intricate strategy screens. Swiftly adapt to ever-changing weather, unexpected crashes, and the emergence of safety cars.

UNLEASH VARIETY ON THE TRACK
Embark on thrilling GT and Endurance racing adventures across six distinct championships. Immerse yourself in the iconic beauty of Monaco's settings, rendered in breathtaking artistry.

DRIVERS TAKE CENTER STAGE
Step into the shoes of promising new drivers, delve into their statistics, and cultivate pivotal relationships. Navigate the revamped HQ, seize upgrade opportunities, and master the new part development system for an immersive journey.

YOUR JOURNEY, YOUR CHALLENGE
Embark on a motorsport odyssey where every choice shapes your destiny. Witness dynamic AI team movements and adjust the difficulty level as the game evolves with you.

SEIZE CONTROL, MAKE HISTORY
It's your opportunity to rewrite the annals of racing lore and etch your name into the history of motorsport. Motorsport Manager 4 empowers you like never before.

hk.trackName: 國家天氣Pro-15日即時天氣預報&空氣品質
hk.description:
国家天氣Pro（National weather pro) - 即時提供未來15天天氣預報、全球雷達、颱風實時路徑及預報、地震、空氣品質、未來15天（360小時）每小時天氣預報、花粉過敏、釣魚、室外運動、降雨概率、當前即時天氣等功能。無廣告免費天氣App。

****準確、即時、15日天氣預報****
    即時更新當前天氣。
    定位地址精確到街道門牌號，天氣精確到所在位置周邊1.2KM範圍內。
    更新地址，即時更新天氣信息。
    15日全球天氣預報，出行計劃更保障。

****15日（360小時）每小時天氣預報****
    未來15日，每個小時的天氣情況
    每小時支持天氣、溫度、體感溫度、氣壓、紫外線、露點、能見度、風向、風速、雲層覆蓋率、降雨概率、降雨量、降雪量、釣魚指數、運動指數等等
    更細緻準確的出行規劃

****地震****
    支持近200年，共72萬條地震記錄。並即時更新最新地震信息。
    地震可在地圖內展示，提供地震震級、強度、深度，致死率預估、強度圖、影響城市，海嘯、山體滑坡、地震液化等不同等級預警。
    地震數據繁雜難懂，我們提供每個指標的通俗化提示。

****衛星雷達****
    提供颱風等級、運動路徑、影響範圍等在地圖內展示。
    支持雷達、雲圖、24小時降雨量、24小時降雪量、雷電、溫度、體感溫度、紫外線、露點、溫度、駕駛難度信息及未來預報，在地圖上展示。

****Apple Watch****
    支持Apple Watch，以及錶盤複雜功能。

****支持 Widget****
    支持桌面widget，顯示當前天氣、溫度、體感溫度、風向、風速、紫外線、濕度，未來6小時天氣及未來2天天氣預報
    支持鎖屏widget，顯示當前天氣、溫度、體感溫度、風向、風速、紫外線、濕度等。

****花粉過敏預報****
    為花粉過敏用戶提供未來15天的所在位置的花粉過敏信息

****生活指數****
    釣魚：支持未來15天每小時釣魚指數
    運動：支持未來15天每小時運動指數
    是否攜帶雨傘提醒
    防曬指數及提醒
    穿衣指數及提醒
    洗車至少及提醒
    顯示當前日期日曆

****個性、美觀****
    收錄各地美麗風景作為天氣背景圖片，更簡潔美觀
    用戶可以自定義壁紙，更有個性，將您喜愛的圖片設置為天氣背景

【訂閱功能說明】
取消方法：請用戶手動在蘋果設備【設定】>>【iTunesStore與App Store】>>選擇【Apple ID】>>點擊即【查看Apple ID】>>在賬戶設置界面點擊【訂閱】>>取消國家天氣的訂閱即可。

【專業天氣套餐自動續訂價格】
購買3個月專業天氣套餐 每3個月將以$0.99美元的價格購買和自動續費
購買6個月專業天氣套餐 每6個月將以$1.99美元的價格購買和自動續費
購買12個月專業天氣套餐 每12個月將以$3.49美元的價格購買和自動續費
自動續費扣款時機：定於其結束前1天自動續費延續。在訂閱結束前1天取消,則訂閱方案會停止。

hk.description:
《Halls of Torment》是一款生存遊戲，畫面採用預先渲染的復古風，類似於1990年代晚期的角色扮演遊戲。從多名英雄角色中選擇一名操控，並進入致命的苦痛殿堂闖蕩。對抗不潔的恐怖生物，並在敵人一波波的攻勢下努力求生，直到其中一位苦痛領主登場。使用角色特長、技能和物品強化英雄。在闖關過程中打造全新強力流派。探索地底的各個地方，尋找全新強力物品，讓你能夠闖入更黑暗的深淵。

2023年Steam年度最佳肉鸽遊戲Halls of Torment現已上線移動端，快來加入這場90年代復古風格ARPG的生存挑戰吧！

【遊戲特色】
◆闖關只要30分鐘，輕鬆又快速
◆ 經典預先渲染美術風格
◆ 任務導向的遊戲進程
◆ 多種不同的技能、特長和物品可供選擇，讓你搭配出有趣的組合
◆ 各種不同的頭目，主打獨特機製和攻擊模式
◆ 多名各具特色的角色，讓你能夠體驗多種玩法
◆ 解鎖並探索多個有趣且高難度的地底世界
◆ 可送回遊戲主世界並用於後續闖關的獨特物品
◆ 調製魔法藥水，讓命運女神祝你一臂之力
◆ 解鎖各個職業的力量，並和你指定的角色結合
◆ 找到稀有版本的物品，進一步優化你的流派配置

【完整內容清單】 
◆6個關卡，環境各具特色
◆11名可扮演角色和角色印記
◆25個祝福，能在闖關過程中使你強大
◆60種不同的物品可供收集和解鎖
◆240個稀有度更高版本的物品
◆74個技能和技能升級
◆30個神器，可用來調整遊戲體驗
◆超過35個獨特首領
◆超過70種獨特怪物
◆超過500個任務可完成
◆超過1000個特長，可用來升級角色和技能

遊戲內容還在不斷推陳出新，日後還能玩到更豐富精彩的內容！

【聯係我們】

Email: prglobal@erabitstudios.com

Dungeon Maker與Dungeon Defense開發商＂Game Cosater＂的最新力作！

因無數勇者們的侵略，副本已成廢墟，魔界也遭受破壞。
你為了重建魔界，需要侵略勇者們的根據地。
在那裡，恢復魔界的力量，並擊敗光之軍隊吧。

你要獨自入侵已被光所支配的星球。

同時也要從勇者身上奪取裝備來武裝。

得到強大的力量，就可以獲得魔界之魔神們的祝福。
接合魔神與怪物的力量，壓制巨大的勇者軍團吧。

◇ 10隻精英怪物與100個以上的專屬技能
◇ 重建度越高，魔界的力量就越來越強大
◇ 隨機選擇與機會所構成的Roguelike玩法

謝謝。

mo.description:
探索神秘地圖，尋找巨龍蹤跡！
完成任務，收集資源，升級獵人技能。
解鎖祕密，戰勝強敵，成為最強獵龍者！

Mental clutter drains your energy. Bother Bin lets you offload anxious thoughts and record your progress, transforming chaos into organized achievement—one small victory after another.

Bother Bin isn’t a task list or To-Do app. The goal isn’t to “check off” items, but to continuously explore. Even if an attempt doesn’t solve the problem, it’s worth leaving a footprint to remind yourself you’re always moving forward.

Why People Love It

“Can’t live without it anymore! I’ve written all my recent anxieties here, and watching them get solved one by one gives me so much hope in life!”
“It’s the best app I’ve ever used. Deceptively simple interface, incredibly powerful results. My whole life feels more organized now!”
“Whenever I can’t sleep, I open the app, dump my thoughts, and drift off.”
“Seeing each tiny win time-stamped keeps me motivated to finish.”

Key Features
	•	One-Tap Brain Dump – Capture any thought, worry, or idea before it spirals.
	•	Time-Stamped Progress Log – Record every small win and see momentum build along an auto-sorted timeline.
	•	Smart Status Chips – Switch between Idea, In Progress, and Solved to stay laser-focused.
	•	100 % Offline Storage – Data stays on your device only. No ads, no tracking, no cookies or data collection. No Internet connection required.
	•	Light & Dark Modes – Easy on the eyes, automatically follows your system theme.

Perfect For
	•	Overthinkers & Insomniacs who need instant mind relief.
	•	ADHD Makers & Creatives who work best by offloading rapid-fire ideas.
	•	Procrastinators who break the paralysis with micro-progress tracking.
	•	Startup Founders & Product Builders tracking daily execution.
	•	Worry Warriors who transform daily stress into manageable action steps.
	•	Learners & Habit-Hackers who stay motivated by watching solved counts climb.

Your success story begins with a single worry recorded and transforms into countless victories celebrated. Every small step forward is rewriting what’s possible in your life. Download Bother Bin today and give your mind the space it deserves.

mo.description:
Dawncaster: Epic Deck-Building Adventure

Dive into a world of strategy and magic in Dawncaster, the ultimate deck-building experience with over 900 stunning hand-illustrated cards. Will you become a shadow-dancing rogue, an indomitable warrior, a mysterious Seeker, or forge your own path? Unravel the dark secrets of Aethos in this tactical masterpiece that revolutionizes mobile card gaming.

Redefining Card Games

- Experience groundbreaking mechanics that seasoned players will love
- Blend unique class abilities with powerful weapons and enchantments
- Master an innovative energy system, freeing you from traditional deckbuilder constraints

A World Shrouded in Mystery

- Embark on a quest to find the legendary 'Dawnbringer' lost in the corrupted realm of Umbris
- Immerse yourself in a richly illustrated world with compelling dialogue and meaningful choices
- Shape the fate of a desperate world through your actions

Complete Gaming Experience

- Unlock all cards and classes with your purchase - no microtransactions!
- Open up new exciting area's with optional expansion packs for even more content
- Enjoy a premium game free from ads, timers, or pay-to-win mechanics

Endless Replayability

- Every run is unique with randomized encounters and battles
- Unlock new starting cards, portraits, and challenges
- Test your skills with increasing difficulty levels

Join the Dawncaster Community

- Connect with fellow players and developers on the Discord server
- Share strategies, get the latest updates, and influence the game's future
- Be part of a passionate community that's shaping the future of Dawncaster

Ready to answer the call? Download Dawncaster now and begin your legendary journey!

Discord: https://discord.gg/pfeMG9c
Website: https://dawncaster.wanderlost.games

mo.description:
網絡調試工具是一款TCP&UDP通信調試工具，工具功能豐富，界面清晰，簡單易用。可以協助網絡維護人員、程序開發人員調試網絡。主要功能包括：
1. 集成TCP客戶端、服務端；UDP客戶端、服務端
2. 支持Ping
3. 支持Ping監控(定時自動Ping指定服務器)
4. 支持組播
5. 支持UDP广播
6. 支持端口掃描(Port Scan)
7. 支持Trace Route
8. 支持局域網IP掃描
9. 支持Whois
10. 支持命令面板
11. 多客戶端鏈接同時管理
12. 定時自動發送報文
13. 支持16進制、UTF-8、Unicode字符編碼切換
14. 自動緩存上次發送報文

tw.description:
8mm is so realistic it was even used to film scenes in the Oscar-winning documentary Searching for Sugar Man!

We have established the de facto standard of real-time retro film emulation. It was featured by Apple in App of the Day, App of the Week, In the Director's Chair, App Store Essentials, etc.

8mm Vintage Camera captures the beauty and magic of old-school vintage movies right through your viewfinder. Dust and scratches, retro colors, flickering, light leaks, and even frame shake, all can be instantly added with a single tap of the finger.

SHOOT BOTH PHOTOS AND VIDEOS WITH SOPHISTICATED LIVE EFFECTS

• Combine effects of film color, halation, dust & scratch, film grain, and softening to create authentic old-school movies
• Adjust the strength of the effects to achieve your own unique visual style
• 10 Lenses (frame) effects: Projector, Vignetting, Light Leak, Color Fringing, Super 8, Screen, 16mm, Tube, color negatives of Super 8 and 16mm
• 21 Retro & Aged Films: 1920, Noir, 60s, 70s, Sakura, XPro, Siena, Pela, Indigo, Tuscan, Two-Color, 2-Strip, 3X, and monochromes
• Additional 21 filters that emulate real historical films and expired films - available with the 8mm Pro subscription
• Jitter Button to imitate real 8mm projectors frame shakes
• Sound Switch to add projector sound for extra authenticity or mute the video for a silent movie effect.
• Up to 4K 30fps with original unfiltered video recording on newer devices

A COMPACT EDITOR FOR MOVIE CREATION

- Apply film and frame effects to clips
- Trim video, pan & zoom photo
- Add a soundtrack from your music library
- Choose from 5 unique themes with matching titles, transitions

8MM PRO SUBSCRIPTION

- You can subscribe or make a one-time purchase for unlimited access to all current filters and future updates
- Start your subscription with a free 7-day trial. Once the trial is over, you’ll be charged an annual subscription fee
- Your subscription will automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. You can go to your Settings > Apple ID > Subscriptions to turn auto-renew off

us.description:
MOTORSPORT MANAGER 4: MASTER RACE STRATEGY

BUILD YOUR RACING DYNASTY
Immerse yourself in the captivating journey of constructing your motorsport empire from the ground up, where every choice holds the key to your success.

ASSEMBLE YOUR DREAM TEAM
Hand-pick exceptional drivers and engineer a world-class racing powerhouse. Collaborate closely with drivers to secure pole positions and craft pitstop strategies that lead to race domination.

REAL-TIME STRATEGY UNFOLDS
Experience the adrenaline-pumping action of races in real-time or navigate through intricate strategy screens. Swiftly adapt to ever-changing weather, unexpected crashes, and the emergence of safety cars.

UNLEASH VARIETY ON THE TRACK
Embark on thrilling GT and Endurance racing adventures across six distinct championships. Immerse yourself in the iconic beauty of Monaco's settings, rendered in breathtaking artistry.

DRIVERS TAKE CENTER STAGE
Step into the shoes of promising new drivers, delve into their statistics, and cultivate pivotal relationships. Navigate the revamped HQ, seize upgrade opportunities, and master the new part development system for an immersive journey.

YOUR JOURNEY, YOUR CHALLENGE
Embark on a motorsport odyssey where every choice shapes your destiny. Witness dynamic AI team movements and adjust the difficulty level as the game evolves with you.

SEIZE CONTROL, MAKE HISTORY
It's your opportunity to rewrite the annals of racing lore and etch your name into the history of motorsport. Motorsport Manager 4 empowers you like never before.

Mental clutter drains your energy. Bother Bin lets you offload anxious thoughts and record your progress, transforming chaos into organized achievement—one small victory after another.

Bother Bin isn’t a task list or To-Do app. The goal isn’t to “check off” items, but to continuously explore. Even if an attempt doesn’t solve the problem, it’s worth leaving a footprint to remind yourself you’re always moving forward.

Why People Love It

“Can’t live without it anymore! I’ve written all my recent anxieties here, and watching them get solved one by one gives me so much hope in life!”
“It’s the best app I’ve ever used. Deceptively simple interface, incredibly powerful results. My whole life feels more organized now!”
“Whenever I can’t sleep, I open the app, dump my thoughts, and drift off.”
“Seeing each tiny win time-stamped keeps me motivated to finish.”

Key Features
	•	One-Tap Brain Dump – Capture any thought, worry, or idea before it spirals.
	•	Time-Stamped Progress Log – Record every small win and see momentum build along an auto-sorted timeline.
	•	Smart Status Chips – Switch between Idea, In Progress, and Solved to stay laser-focused.
	•	100 % Offline Storage – Data stays on your device only. No ads, no tracking, no cookies or data collection. No Internet connection required.
	•	Light & Dark Modes – Easy on the eyes, automatically follows your system theme.

Perfect For
	•	Overthinkers & Insomniacs who need instant mind relief.
	•	ADHD Makers & Creatives who work best by offloading rapid-fire ideas.
	•	Procrastinators who break the paralysis with micro-progress tracking.
	•	Startup Founders & Product Builders tracking daily execution.
	•	Worry Warriors who transform daily stress into manageable action steps.
	•	Learners & Habit-Hackers who stay motivated by watching solved counts climb.

Your success story begins with a single worry recorded and transforms into countless victories celebrated. Every small step forward is rewriting what’s possible in your life. Download Bother Bin today and give your mind the space it deserves.

us.trackName: 生辰 — 桌面时间小组件
us.description:
这是一款关于生、死、心愿与延续的App。

小时候，我以为自己是不会老去的彼得·潘，却终究敌不过健康磨损，容颜老去。
时针转动，生命流逝，但每一次心跳都可以更加有力。

有时候，生命只是一连串的数字，多少年，多少月，多少小时，多少分钟。当你意识到这个时，往往陷入巨大的虚无感之中，惶恐不能自拔。
而现在，这些数字可以成为你重塑生命的坐标，指引你走向更健康、更长久的未来。

生辰 2.0 通过 AI 分析和科学判断，不仅预测生命的终点，更为你铺就延长生命的道路：

- 探索你的生命时钟：了解当下的预期寿命，直面生命的有限与珍贵。
- 发现延寿的可能：看见改变健康习惯能为你带来多少额外的生命时光。
- 聚合健康数据：自动追踪睡眠、锻炼、压力（HRV）、经期、喝水等十余种健康数据

美国诗人纳·斯待尔在87岁那年写道：
"如果我能够从头活过，我会试着犯更多的错。
我会放松一点，我会灵活一点。
我会爬更多的山，游更多的河，看更多的日落。"

因为了解生命的终点，才能更好地珍惜当下的每一刻。生辰2.0 探索健康的可能，让我们成为你健康旅程的长久伙伴。

【生辰 App 会员服务说明】

1.会员包含几种订购类型
订阅周期：1个月、3个月、12个月
2.首次订购后会通过iTunes账户直接支付；账户会在到期前24小时内扣费，扣费成功后自动顺延一个订阅周期
3.本服务由您自主选择是否续订，如需取消，请在订阅到期24小时前，在 AppleID 设置中取消
4.生辰App 会员协议
生辰App 会员服务协议：https://post.jellow.club/whatslife-payment/
5.生辰App 软件协议与隐私政策
生辰 软件许可及服务协议：https://post.jellow.club/whatslife-agreement/
生辰 隐私协议：https://post.jellow.club/whatslife-privacy/

us.description:
8mm is so realistic it was even used to film scenes in the Oscar-winning documentary Searching for Sugar Man!

We have established the de facto standard of real-time retro film emulation. It was featured by Apple in App of the Day, App of the Week, In the Director's Chair, App Store Essentials, etc.

8mm Vintage Camera captures the beauty and magic of old-school vintage movies right through your viewfinder. Dust and scratches, retro colors, flickering, light leaks, and even frame shake, all can be instantly added with a single tap of the finger.

SHOOT BOTH PHOTOS AND VIDEOS WITH SOPHISTICATED LIVE EFFECTS

• Combine effects of film color, halation, dust & scratch, film grain, and softening to create authentic old-school movies
• Adjust the strength of the effects to achieve your own unique visual style
• 10 Lenses (frame) effects: Projector, Vignetting, Light Leak, Color Fringing, Super 8, Screen, 16mm, Tube, color negatives of Super 8 and 16mm
• 21 Retro & Aged Films: 1920, Noir, 60s, 70s, Sakura, XPro, Siena, Pela, Indigo, Tuscan, Two-Color, 2-Strip, 3X, and monochromes
• Additional 21 filters that emulate real historical films and expired films - available with the 8mm Pro subscription
• Jitter Button to imitate real 8mm projectors frame shakes
• Sound Switch to add projector sound for extra authenticity or mute the video for a silent movie effect.
• Up to 4K 30fps with original unfiltered video recording on newer devices

A COMPACT EDITOR FOR MOVIE CREATION

- Apply film and frame effects to clips
- Trim video, pan & zoom photo
- Add a soundtrack from your music library
- Choose from 5 unique themes with matching titles, transitions

8MM PRO SUBSCRIPTION

- You can subscribe or make a one-time purchase for unlimited access to all current filters and future updates
- Start your subscription with a free 7-day trial. Once the trial is over, you’ll be charged an annual subscription fee
- Your subscription will automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. You can go to your Settings > Apple ID > Subscriptions to turn auto-renew off

The network debugging tool is a TCP&UDP communication debugging tool with rich functions, clear interface, and easy to use. It can assist network maintenance personnel and program developers to debug the network. The main features include:
1. Integrated TCP client and server; UDP client and server
2. Support Ping
3. Support Ping Monitor(Timed automatic Ping server)
4. Support UDP Broadcast
5. Support Multicast
6. Support Port Scan
7. Support TraceRoute
8. Support Lan Scan
9. Support Whois
10. Support Command Panel
11. Multi-client link management at the same time
12. Automatically send messages at regular intervals
13. Support hexadecimal, UTF-8, Unicode, GBK character encoding switching
14. Automatically cache the last message sent

us.description:
Halls of Torment is a horde survival game with a pre-rendered retro look reminiscent of RPGs from the late 90s. Choose one of many hero characters and descend into the deadly Halls of Torment. Fight unholy horrors from beyond and survive wave after wave of enemies until you face one of the tormented Lords. 

Strengthen your hero with character traits, abilities, and items. Create a new powerful build during each run. Explore various underground expanses and find new powerful items that enable you to venture even deeper into the abyss.

First available on Steam, the 90's-style RPG survival roguelike, Halls of Torment, is now making its debut on mobile!

【Features】
◆ Quick and casual 30 minute runs
◆ Old school pre-rendered art style
◆ Quest-based meta progression
◆ Large selection of diverse abilities, traits, and items, all enabling you to create interesting synergies
◆ Diverse bosses featuring unique mechanics and attack patterns
◆ Several distinct characters allowing for many different play styles
◆ Unlock and explore multiple interesting and challenging underground worlds
◆ Unique items can be sent up to the overworld and used to customize future runs
◆ Craft magical tinctures to direct fate in your favor
◆ Unlock the power of each class and combine them with your chosen character
◆ Find rare item variants to further improve your builds

【Full Content List】
◆6 stages with unique environments
◆11 playable characters & character marks
◆25 blessings that make you stronger for each run
◆60 unique items to retrieve and unlock
◆240 higher rarity item variants
◆74 abilities and ability upgrades
◆30 artifacts to customize your game experience
◆35+ unique bosses
◆70+ unique monsters
◆500 quests to complete
◆1000+ traits that upgrade characters and abilities

◆ 1000+ traits that upgrade characters and abilities

Our content list is still growing, expect more in the future! 

【Contact Us】
Discord: @Erabit or join via https://discord.gg/Gkje2gzCqB
Email: prglobal@erabitstudios.com

us.description:
The new game of the developer ""GameCoaster"", who made Dungeon Maker and Dungeon Defense!

A seemingly infinite stream of heroes invaded the dungeon and brought ruin to the Abyss.
Now you must go straight to the source of the enemy and return your home to its former glory.
Defeat the Army of Light and take back the power of the Abyss.

You are tasked with infiltrating a planet dominated by light all on your own.
You must bring down the heroes and use them to summon monsters to fight alongside you,
armed with the equipment of these fallen sacrifices.

Once you are strong enough, you may receive the blessings of the Dark Gods,
and combine their powers with those of your monsters to bring down colossal groups of enemies.

◇ 10 elite monsters and over 100 unique skills
◇ The Power of the Abyss gets stronger as you rebuild
◇ Roguelike with random choices and opportunities

Halls of Torment is a horde survival game with a pre-rendered retro look reminiscent of RPGs from the late 90s. Choose one of many hero characters and descend into the deadly Halls of Torment. Fight unholy horrors from beyond and survive wave after wave of enemies until you face one of the tormented Lords. 

Strengthen your hero with character traits, abilities, and items. Create a new powerful build during each run. Explore various underground expanses and find new powerful items that enable you to venture even deeper into the abyss.

First available on Steam, the 90's-style RPG survival roguelike, Halls of Torment, is now making its debut on mobile!

【Features】
◆ Quick and casual 30 minute runs
◆ Old school pre-rendered art style
◆ Quest-based meta progression
◆ Large selection of diverse abilities, traits, and items, all enabling you to create interesting synergies
◆ Diverse bosses featuring unique mechanics and attack patterns
◆ Several distinct characters allowing for many different play styles
◆ Unlock and explore multiple interesting and challenging underground worlds
◆ Unique items can be sent up to the overworld and used to customize future runs
◆ Craft magical tinctures to direct fate in your favor
◆ Unlock the power of each class and combine them with your chosen character
◆ Find rare item variants to further improve your builds

【Full Content List】
◆6 stages with unique environments
◆11 playable characters & character marks
◆25 blessings that make you stronger for each run
◆60 unique items to retrieve and unlock
◆240 higher rarity item variants
◆74 abilities and ability upgrades
◆30 artifacts to customize your game experience
◆35+ unique bosses
◆70+ unique monsters
◆500 quests to complete
◆1000+ traits that upgrade characters and abilities

◆ 1000+ traits that upgrade characters and abilities

Our content list is still growing, expect more in the future! 

【Contact Us】
Discord: @Erabit or join via https://discord.gg/Gkje2gzCqB
Email: prglobal@erabitstudios.com

tr.description:
The new game of the developer ""GameCoaster"", who made Dungeon Maker and Dungeon Defense!

A seemingly infinite stream of heroes invaded the dungeon and brought ruin to the Abyss.
Now you must go straight to the source of the enemy and return your home to its former glory.
Defeat the Army of Light and take back the power of the Abyss.

You are tasked with infiltrating a planet dominated by light all on your own.
You must bring down the heroes and use them to summon monsters to fight alongside you,
armed with the equipment of these fallen sacrifices.

Once you are strong enough, you may receive the blessings of the Dark Gods,
and combine their powers with those of your monsters to bring down colossal groups of enemies.

◇ 10 elite monsters and over 100 unique skills
◇ The Power of the Abyss gets stronger as you rebuild
◇ Roguelike with random choices and opportunities
